body:
Hello.

Due to the recent misconduct displayed by some forum users, the Senior Staff have decided to make this thread to remind our users that we will not tolerate any inappropriate behaviour on the forums. This will cover all fields, and for more reference, please refer to the rules, specifically the "forum rules" of the rules section.
Once again, to elaborate, The Senior Staff will not tolerate any inappropriate behaviour on the forums and we will not hesitate to punish you accordingly.

Regards,
The Senior Staff Team.
